welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cajamar, Brazil! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cajamar has to offer.

airports.airport_name: Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal, exclusively used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Viracopos Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
